mapper.select: SELECT A.iproduct, C.product_nm, C.price, C.new_fl, C.rep_pic, C.rc_fl, C.pop_fl, COUNT(D.ireview) AS reviewCnt FROM t_wish_list A JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser AND A.iuser = #{iuser} JOIN t_product C ON A.iproduct = C.iproduct LEFT JOIN t_review D ON A.iproduct = D.iproduct GROUP BY A.iproduct ORDER BY A.created_at DESC
